title: What's the weirdest thing anyone has tried to report you for?
body:
Mine was: *gets hit by sona ult* "report katrina intentional feeding, u saw the dance"

Yes, I did try to explain to him that Sona's ult makes you dance.
No, he didn't understand.

replies.body: Getting cs with relic shield.
Came here for this XD

Team reported me for winning. 
We were so far ahead and my team was just farming kills in the enemy base instead of winning so I kill the nexus and my team flipped out.
If I say this wins the thread, will I then have to report you for that too?
Buying two pairs of boots on accident when I was new.

Dude, you have two FEET
THERE'S ONLY ONE BOOT
what is the PROBLEM with getting 2 BOOTS for 2 FEET
;(

{{champion:120}} 4x boots. Works well with passive. 


MFW I don't have feet... {{champion:69}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:267}}

{{champion:42}} 
Don't worry, you don't need feet to wear boots, just wear the boots on your head.
I know right? I need one for each foot!

I think this is fair to you- I mean, who doesn't think they should get two boots. I don't remember it saying specifically that it's a pair. I think Corki might need 8 of them (one for each blade of his ROFLCopter)

I got reported for my build being different than what someone else builds when they play the same champ. He kept raging and saying I was retarded for not building what he thinks is right. People need to understand that different playstyles sometimes call for different builds.
That person's an idiot, not for just saying his build is good, but for saying you should build the same items **every** game.
Did you build 6 boots? BC you should have. It's the best build. Just ask a teemo main.

Winning too fast. By the enemy team.
13 minutes.
It was URF.

> [{quoted}](name=Drackolus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7nU1A0Uk,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-25T02:58:20.003+0000)
>
> Winning too fast. By the enemy team.
> 13 minutes.
> It was URF.

Funniest thing ever. Especially when your playing {{champion:28}}.

For being a girl... Someone who was raging noticed I was a girl (by my name) and proceeded to insult me and say that they were going to report me for being a girl.. -__- 

They were going on a tangent on how I shouldn't be allowed to play League. Not even sure why. We were destroying their inhibs and winning the match.
People like that still exist?
My brother got reported for verbal abuse for spamming singed's laugh.

{{champion:103}} _*Gets killed by le'blanc*_PANTHEON SHE'S LOW GET HER

{{champion:80}} _*Ignores*_ "Can't get to lane fast enough

{{champion:103}} PANTHEON YOU DUMB SHT WHATTT THE FKKKK ARE YOU DOING REPORT PANTH

{{champion:80}} Bro calm your tails, can't get there fast enough

{{champion:103}} It's called using your ult

{{champion:80}} I'm level 5. Are you playing lee sin or something?
i got reported for saying ggwp
I was once reported for "feeding" after I went 0/3/40 as Zilean. (This was old zilean, with global passive and targeted Q etc).  I was the support.
Maybe your time magic was so powerful they got turned into a 6 year old

My midlane Zed tried to take my blue so I smited it.  I was a fed Fiddlesticks.

Taking Red Buff as a fighter or tank instead of allowing our feeding ADC to take it (when the enemy divers all have dashes or blinks), even when I'm fed or jungling.

Not ganking for one of my feeding allies, even if I'm getting kills and objectives for our team everywhere else on the map.

People are weird.

While it does somewhat help Zed, Fiddlesticks kinda needs the mana regen for efficient clearing and ganking.  Without it Zed can poke slightly less frequently, while Fiddlesticks suffers from low mana regeneration and can't really clear or gank as efficiently without some form of mana regeneration.  

I'd have understood if it was a mana hungry laner like Anivia, since you can function without blue as Fiddlesticks, but it's not really worth passing it over to a Zed in comparison.

I'm not a toxic player (usually) so if I get reported it tends to be because of something stupid.  The most common thing I get reported for, bar none, is for roleplaying my champion in chat.  Especially when that champion is Mundo.
lmao that sounds so chill tho

I was third pick. Said ADC Please when I got into lobby. Last pick got mad that he couldn't ADC and said that it was decided last game lobby(someone dodged) that he was going to ADC so he picked ashe support and attempted to troll. We ended up dominating the lane. And at the end of the game he kept telling everyone to report me for trolling.   uhm.  what?
Not ganking while playing a Nunu. People, please.

> [{quoted}](name=PlasmaControl,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=7nU1A0Uk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-25T01:32:32.644+0000)
>
> Not ganking while playing a Nunu. People, please.

Have you ever seen Nunu gank? all they can do is buff you, deal like 50 magic damage with their iceballs or whatever and if you're lucky he can get sombody to use flash with a well placed ult.

Edit: forgot the title of the thread sorry

has you seen FULL AP nunu? that snowball HURTS... seriously
(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻) Screw your meta
(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻) Screw "league of tanks" i'll build full AP and still kill you
(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻) Screw "league of mobility" I'm gonna fk you up with ashe
(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻) Screw "leaugue of Scaling" i'll pick someone who does well early and screw your team comp over
(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻) Screw "League of early game" I'll still enjoy Nasus
(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻) Screw your Danger... I AM THE DANGER
http://img.pandawhale.com/post-14714-I-AM-THE-DANGER-gif-Walter-Whi-toNE.gif

EDIT:
(╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻) Screw that stupid "wombo Combo" team comp SPLIIIIIITTTPUUUUUUSSSHHHH (╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻)
man do you hate tables or something? you flipped enough of them right there to clear out a whole Furniture Row it seems.
I reported someone for saying "bruh" yesterday. I stand by my decision.
Bruh....
May your family get measles and your closest friend be killed by your favorite animal.
u mad bruh?

I was once reported for dying protecting the ADC. The ADC raged constantly at me for dying in protection of them. So I decided I wasn't going to die for them anymore. Then they raged and wanted me reported for not keeping them from dying. I saw no way to win in that situation.
The joys of playing support for an adc with no clue what support is all about...

When an ADC main picks a Jinx etc and then:

* fail-flash against the wall.
* stands in front of the team in teamfights like a fking Garen.
* buys Essence Reaver

and her excuse for not being deserve to be reported for "Unskilled Player" is...

"I'm new to Jinx"

So what you're saying is, you used the LEAST damaging form of report (Unskilled, i don't think ANYONE has gotten banned for that.)
and the person was like
Ey Bruv
Being unskilled
is =/=
being unskilled

Am i right?
You won't get banned for unskilled.. the only thing it does is possibly lose them some normal que mmr

A Vayne in the top lane said I was a cheater because I was getting back HP on Vladimir without Lifesteal or Spellvamp.
And by the way she said it, I'm still not sure if she was trolling or not.

You're a fucking vampire

I mean the theme...

It must have been a 6 year old

or someone who horribly failed their IQ test
playing {{champion:6}}
Someone told me they'd report me for being a tryhard and picking Irelia, the funny thing is that he was a toplane Hecarim with smite/teleport and cinderhulk.

One game I was playing J4 jungle and the enemy jungle threatened to report me because I kept counter jungling him and stealing all his buffs. Another game I was threatened with a report for NOT intentionally feeding. Yeah, seriously.
While at full hp, getting dived under tower and dying without being able to kill anyone then getting blamed for not hugging tower and farming...

Our Jarvan was raging at our bot, and I told him to take a chill pill.

"Stfu kid reported"
I didn't give Blue to Yasuo...
